author: Staff Reporter
text:
The public examinations for Class 12 higher secondary students will begin on March 4, the government announced on Tuesday. The exams which commence with the Part I Language paper will go on till April 1, when Physics and Economics papers examinations are to be held. The examinations will be held from 10.15 a.m. to 1.15 p.m.

The SSLC examinations begin on March 15 with the part I Tamil paper and end on April 13 with the Part IV optional paper. The exams will be conducted from 9.15 a.m. to 12 noon.
title: Class 12 exams to begin on March 4
